name: Wires+
author: SkimnerPhi & Shrimp
description: Adds commonly used wire designs as single buildings

extra.readme:
More Wires

Adds two new wire colors, orange and purple, that otherwise act like vanilla wires. Also, adds wire insulators, which are like wire crossings but go in different directions.

New Buildings

Advanced Processing

Mix and unmix colors by converting them to binary, or by adding and subtracting them. Smart processors can be used even when only one input is connected.

Memory

Store data using flip flops and memory cells.

Edge Detectors

Set up tick-precision circuits quickly with edge detectors, which will pulse for a single tick when the input value changes.

Multiplexers

Select between inputs or outputs with muxers and demuxers.

Arithmetic

Add together boolean values with the adder.

Diodes

Prevent backflow with diodes and buffers.

More Virtual Processors

Use 180Â° and CCW virtual rotators so you don't have to chain the vanilla rotator.

Mod Support

With Shapez Industries installed, virtual combiners and smelters help you process shapez on the virtual layer. Lots of Colors works with the color adder and subtractor.
